name: stepbystep
description: stepbystep is a minimalistic programming puzzle platformer with experimental turn-based mechanics where you must write a command sequence to complete the levels that will be run automatically.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Ivy Bridge or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Ivy Bridge or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 100 MB available space
